text: Ne khubandu ba Madyan,(khwaruma) omusiani wabu ( ulangwa mbu) Shuabu. Naboola mbu: â€œenywe Abandu banje mulaame Nyasaye, mubula Nyasaye wundi owulali ye tawe. Ne Mulaleemia eshichelo nohomba iratili tawe. Esie ebalolanga muli obulayi, ne toto esie abaririra eshinyasio shilibabotokhana inyanga eyo
